metadata.title: CVE-2013-4251 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The scipy.weave component in SciPy before 0.12.1 creates insecure temporarydirectories.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4251` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-scipy - 0.13.3-1build1
python3-scipy - 0.13.3-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-scipy package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.13.3-1build1').
